title: How to ditch Spotify, and move your playlists and music library to another streaming service
content:
Welcome to TNW Basics, a collection of tips, guides, and advice on how to easily get the most out of your gadgets, apps, and other stuff. When you’re thinking of switching one music streaming service to another, you don’t want to ruin your library. All of us want to migrate all our albums, songs, and playlists, and we want to carry over our meticulous curation to the new app. With that in mind, I’ve tested a bunch of apps that help you migrate your preferences and curated playlists from one streaming music service to another. Before you get started, it’s worth…

This story continues at The Next Web

Or just read more coverage about: Spotify
description: Here's a handy guide for you to move your songs, albums, and playlists from Spotify, Apple Music, YouTube Music, to another.
